## JsPlumbInstance.addEndpoint() method

Add an Endpoint to the given element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEndpoint(el: T["E"], params?: EndpointOptions<T["E"]>, referenceParams?: EndpointOptions<T["E"]>): Endpoint;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
